titles.title: Aviation Consumer Protection Extension Act of 2006
A bill to amend the Aviation and Transportation Security Act to extend the suspended service ticket honor requirement.
Aviation Consumer Protection Extension Act of 2006

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: Aviation Consumer Protection Extension Act of 2006 - Amends the Aviation and Transportation Security Act to extend through November 30, 2007, the requirement that air carriers honor tickets (as specified) for suspended air passenger service by other air carriers.
